recipesJson.name: Cuddly Squares
recipesJson.author: Sgtreadwell
recipesJson.description: Strawberry peaches. Better after a few days steep when the peaches settle down

reviews.text: This is a really good mix after a few days steep, as in most mixes (for me at least) with peach in them I need to let it steep a few days for the peach to mellow out, but once that's done it is phenomenal, this is going to be one of my ADV's. Thanks for sharing, and keep up the great work.
